resources.string: When enabled friends will load by small packs otherwise 5000 will be loaded at once. (Default: True)
Controls how many friends will be loaded in first pack. (Default: 30)
Controls how many friends will be loaded in next packs. (Default: 20)
Preferences in this category should be changed only if you have a point what are you doing as it could break your app
Should application cache loaded friends data. (Default: True)
